channel.title: Changing the Char Module
channel.description: Okay so me and my friend are working on actually creating a game, but we want to start out with a base of RSPS to kinda find are way around and everything. I know a lot of java, but im warming back into it. We are going to start with a 317 and see what we can do. But I am curious and would be very happy if some one would tell me on how to change the Character Module, so we can put are own characters in it. And also were the animation is found that makes the char move and all of that. If you know that would be greatly appreciated, We are making are own graphics i just dont know how to replace the old one

item.title: Changing the Char Module
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

killrpkz:

But like could anyone point me in the way to find the character module, i mean i somewhat new where it would be located at… I just dont know how to figure out witch one it is…

Get tom’s cache editor (google it there’s a billion links) and open your cache to dig around in the models. Or find a tutorial that shows you how to ‘update’ the player model, but use yours instead of theirs.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing the Char Module
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I believe all models and anims are cache packed, unless they hardcoded it (Which is stupid imo) and if that’s the case it’d be in the raw folder or something like it in the cache.
Get RSMV to view the models and make sure it’s the char model.

Read full topic

its with the other models as far as i understand but where is beyond me
